reviews.cons: There are many other options that provide similar features. It has proven difficult to move employees away from texting and onto the Hangouts app.

reviews.title: “Google Chat”
reviews.pros: The application allows users to chat online through instant messaging . Users are able to chat while using other google applications such as google docs.
reviews.cons: Sometimes the users appearing to be online are not online. There could be a delay in time "last seen" online

reviews.title: “Makes working with a group much easier ”
reviews.pros: I like how I am able to message group members of a google doc easily with this software
reviews.cons: I don’t know how to start a chat or how to save a chat. Still learning how to master google chat

reviews.title: “Its as easy to use tool ”
reviews.pros: I used to use for the vide call using this tool also for the messaging service on the android phone
reviews.cons: It was not intuitive as WhatsApp is and also functionality bas bit confusing to make it as primary communication tool.

reviews.title: “Chat allows for quick communication during the busy day”
reviews.text: Chat is simple, convenient, and well-integrated into Gsuite for those who already use Google products.
reviews.pros: I enjoy Chat because it allows me to better multitask between sessions by quickly chatting with my administrative team regarding business concerns remotely.
reviews.cons: I have never experienced any downsides of Chat, so it is challenging to think of any negatives about this software.  It is easy to use!

reviews.title: “Not very professional feeling”
reviews.text: Great for informal chats with staff but feels a bit basic for higher profile calls.
reviews.pros: An easy to use, simple messaging platform. Video calls are of high quality and stability.
reviews.cons: Feels a bit informal. I only really use this for internal comms.

reviews.title: “Great video quality”
reviews.pros: Great collaboration with team, doesnt lagg or interrupt
reviews.cons: Cant think of anything to improve right now

reviews.title: “A chat platfrom by Google”
reviews.pros: Google chat helps to communicate with other google users using direct messages or group conversations. It also allows conferencing features for teams to collaborate, share files and to create or assign tasks.
reviews.cons: Interface could be made better when compared with other similar chatting platforms.

reviews.title: “ Unknown application and little practice”
reviews.text: So far, we use it, so that my children, communicate with their parents, while we are away from home.
reviews.pros: It can be used, from the computer, to communicate, a mobile device, and vice versa. No need for facilities, or additional programs.
reviews.cons: Google, has not been concerned, to make it known, among its users. This causes it to start, because if the receiver does not know it, it's worthless, use it.

reviews.title: “G Hangouts ”
reviews.text: I do use this software as my default messaging app so I do benefit from it
reviews.pros: The software supports online updates, users can receive and also check for updates wherever they have enough internet access
reviews.cons: The software is user-friendly in such a way that you can both have it on mobile device and also computer machines for use

reviews.title: “Basic chat for your workplace”
reviews.text: Overall if you already have GSuite this is a nice tool. If you don't, then I would consider other options like Slack.
reviews.pros: You have all of the basic features you would expect: group chats, direct chats, file sharing, etc. The interface is pretty well laid out.
reviews.cons: Some of the advanced features you would expect are missing. Lack of bots, third party support, and notifications when folks are available.

reviews.title: “Useful for communication ”
reviews.text: As our staff all utilizes Gmail, Google chat has been useful in keeping us connected for quick communication. My colleagues and I have been able to connect quickly without disturbing the learning environment by making phone calls. Having a chat through the software is much more convenient and less distracting to the students.
reviews.pros: I like that this software is readily available right in my gmail account. It easy to use for communication purposes.
reviews.cons: While it is pretty easy to use, I do find that make a group chat can be a little difficult at times. It always takes me a bit of time to remember how to add users to create a new group.

reviews.title: “Good for people with Google Accounts”
reviews.text: I like using it over Skype - it's user friendly and doesn't require creating a new user ID if you already have a Google account.
reviews.pros: It's an easy app to set up and use with other people who have Google / Gmail accounts. Free and not complicated to be able to use it.
reviews.cons: Nothing really not to like, other than the fact that there are now many different video conferencing platforms and getting everyone to agree on one can be challenging.

reviews.title: “Chat Everywhere!”
reviews.pros: Google Chat allows us to stay connected with a platform in doing so. Since we already use many of google's different software adding google chat is a no-brainer. It works perfectly with other functions especially when we have google email we can see the chat right next to our emails.
reviews.cons: Nothing I dislike about google chat. It runs well with other google software.

reviews.title: “Google Chat, Nice product & easy to use.”
reviews.text: My overall experience has been decent.. I haven't had any freezes glitching or anything of that sort. It's been very nice
reviews.pros: I enjoy how simply and easy it is to use.
reviews.cons: I would have really found it useful to be able to combine multi account logins into one account.

reviews.title: “Great to use at work”
reviews.pros: Its a great tool for the office and working with colleagues who you can't reach by phone for various reasons
reviews.cons: Nothing I like least about the software its pretty cool

reviews.title: “Student experience”
reviews.pros: I like the integration into the gmail account when we log in. There is no need of a separate software on the laptop and the browser does everything. The sharing feature is excellent and the video and audio quality is also superb.
reviews.cons: Feature like waiting room should be provided so that when there are office hours for TA's, it becomes of great use for them.

reviews.title: “Google Chat - A great messaging platform”
reviews.text: Overall, easy to use! I recommend.
reviews.pros: It is so easy to instant message on this platform!
reviews.cons: I cannot think of anything to improve on here.

reviews.title: “Google Chat: the unused G-Feature”
reviews.text: An awesome experience overall with Google Chat. We used to create Team chats when working for Google Nest Support so we could clear all Tier 1 agents' questions in real-time.
reviews.pros: The best advantage is creating chat rooms for certain or all G-Suite users. It's easy to use and it does not have the same limits as Hangouts chat.
reviews.cons: It's not a real con, but most people don't have a clue that this exists and have little to no desire to use it.

reviews.title: “Easy way to chat within the office”
reviews.pros: Chats pop up on both PCs and cell phones.  Faster than texting and logs as an email if the receiving person is offline.
reviews.cons: Sometimes hard to get connected to a coworker for chat... seems to not recognize all our email addresses automatically.

reviews.title: “Great chat platform”
reviews.text: Ability to talk to people with ease. Also like how there's an app so you can always use it on the go.
reviews.pros: This was our OG chat platform at my work before Slack took over. With the integration with Google Apps, this was a great fit!
reviews.cons: Inability to talk to multiple people at a time. Also, I don't like how I'm unable to download chat transcripts.

reviews.title: “Productivity at its finest!”
reviews.text: I wish there was a free trial for those that would like to try before you buy.
reviews.pros: I love how I am able to connect with others so easily.  Voice conferencing makes getting work done with others completed in a timely fashion. The gmail account for each person keeps things professional.
reviews.cons: The price is a bit steep per person especially if you want the unlimited storage version.

reviews.title: “Excellent software!”
reviews.pros: An easy to use messaging tool, free software that can compare to other pricey apps.
reviews.cons: I cant say anything wrong about this helpful app! And take note, its free!

reviews.title: “Found a lot more “spam” accounts coming from this platform ”
reviews.text: The functions worked fine, it was handy to have on the side of my gmail.
reviews.pros: I loved that it was tied into my gmail, that it was easy to access. I didn’t have to have another platform open simultaneously.
reviews.cons: Any time I found someone wanting to use Google hangouts for meetings/interviews, the user typically was a spam solicitation.

reviews.title: “G Chat ME Please! ”
reviews.text: Google Chat is very easy and convenient. My friends in LA and New Zealand can communicate with me real time, real fast!
reviews.pros: Love the ease of the product. I can easily chat my friends, coworkers, vendors, and more! Communication has never been easier and quicker.
reviews.cons: I cannot think of features that I do not like about Google Chat. I have used this product for a while and I like it.

reviews.title: “Great Way to Connect”
reviews.text: Overall it is a good software. It was just hard to use this software with parents who couldn't use it on their devices.
reviews.pros: I like this software because you can connect with a lot of people in one place. It is easy to use with the other platforms.
reviews.cons: Some of the features could be tweaked a little. Like coming up with a way to make people who join the meet have to leave their email address. Then be able to track them.

reviews.title: “Important platform for communication network in different institutions”
reviews.pros: Google messaging platform available for G SUITE users, it is practical and interactive.
reviews.cons: It requires a little more practice to use, as it is not a very well-known tool, many users use too many institutional communication platforms.

reviews.title: “G Suite ”
reviews.text: Basically we can use the software to monitor a group of working individuals and get to see each ones progress to the team and what they are up to.
reviews.pros: Its ability to keep track of who is on the team and who is off , and keeps the login dates
reviews.cons: if you want to read other peoples emails on your team you have to login or change their password which for me if not the best thing to have

reviews.title: “easy way to get in touch with co-workers”
reviews.text: I enjoy using this product to talk with co-workers in a quick real time moment. instead of sending an email .
reviews.pros: I like that it is a real time way to interact with another google user. I use this to talk with co-workers.
reviews.cons: I dont like that the history goes away after 24 hours, it would be nice if it saved for a longer period of time.

reviews.title: “G Suite  Chat Review”
reviews.text: I enjoy this  software alot.
reviews.pros: Google Drive is included and the email works amazing.  G Suite is very easy to use and flexible and also the support by Google is very good.
reviews.cons: The thing that I would say I like least about G Suite is that there is only 30 GB of storage to share between Drive, Gmail and Google Photos.

reviews.title: “Google Chat Review- Chris”
reviews.pros: It was an easier way to interact with other professionals without necessarily going to social media.
reviews.cons: It is not user friendly like the social media and also somehow creates fear that someonw may access your official information.

reviews.title: “Chat rocks!”
reviews.pros: It is incredibly easy to access. Makes for talking to your coworkers in one location useful. Creating/managing groups is very simple to do. Learning curve does not exist since everything is nothing new to messaging programs.
reviews.cons: It's just another chat program. It is nothing new. It doesn't offer anything that other chats don't already offer.

reviews.title: “Love it”
reviews.text: Google products are always really good. Google chat is no exception. I really love this
reviews.pros: I really love Google chat. It’s a really great and easy to use platform. Like most Google products it really hits the spot
reviews.cons: I don’t have many complaints. They are probably features I don’t know as much about, but that it’s more because of me and my usage than anything else.

reviews.title: “Very user friendly!”
reviews.text: Connects everyone easily. There are a few members on the team that lack basic technological knowledge - and they all managed to pick it up after a couple of tries and not much explaining!
reviews.pros: It is extremely user friendly and easy to use for beginners who are not confident with technology.
reviews.cons: No cons as of yet. I only started using it recently during lockdown and can only say good things!

reviews.title: “We use google chat to communicate with customers who prefer this platform”
reviews.pros: So simple and easy to use.  The mobile app is perfect as well.
reviews.cons: There have been a lot of changes recently that made accessing chat a bit difficult.  Feels like a constant learning curve.

reviews.title: “Chat Review”
reviews.pros: I like that you are easily able to chat with friends, online, for free. You can use this to chat in a workplace environment and it is easy to use. You can also keep track with a log of previous chats.
reviews.cons: There is nothing really that I dislike about this software, it is easy to use and user friendly.

reviews.title: “Google Chat ”
reviews.text: Overall, great experience. The only thing that would increase the value of this product would be customer support for questions and quick resolution to issues.
reviews.pros: I really liked the ease of use to be able to chat with employees and customers is such a great tool.
reviews.cons: Customer support should be more readily available to users if they have a question on navigation of this product.

reviews.title: “I like using Google Chat ”
reviews.pros: I like being able to send instant messages using this program. I can keep in touch with my friends, family members, etc. even if I have moved out of state. I don't feel like we are too far apart since I can easily communicate with them still.
reviews.cons: Need to have a G Suite account, separate from Gmail.

reviews.title: “Chatter matters”
reviews.pros: Chat is an excellent way to stay in touch with family, friends and business associates.
reviews.cons: The only negative feature is that it wasn't as readily used as email or texting. Many of my "contacts" do not participate in "Chat".

reviews.title: “Google Chat”
reviews.text: Overall, it's great! I do think there are better products on the market but it's convenient and easy to use.
reviews.pros: I love that you can see in your sidebar who is already online and that the messages can be saved into your gmail account for future reference.
reviews.cons: I wish there was a more cohesive way to work with GIFS and sharing creative content (referring to how slack allows for you to react with emojis).

reviews.title: “Easy to Use Chat Feature”
reviews.pros: Google Chat is an easy feature to implement. It's an alternative to emailing co-workers when there are quick questions that need to be answer or if a longer conversation needs to happen as well.
reviews.cons: Google Chat is something new and some people are opposed to changes, but there isn't anything that I do not like about the software itself.

reviews.title: “Quick and Easy to Run Meetings/Convo”
reviews.pros: The fact I can start right from inside my email or calendar makes this tool very simple and easy to get up and running.
reviews.cons: I have found that some people are confused by the link to use this tool versus other tools (Zoom)

reviews.title: “INTOUCH”
reviews.pros: It keeps me in-touch with my manager thru the day. Being integrated with bots, you can easily use them to arrange things for you
reviews.cons: how easily my life can be scheduled away, you really need to have blocked off periods so you can manage your work load without someone scheduling a meeting on you.

reviews.title: “Chat at any time!”
reviews.pros: Easy to communicate with friend groups, work-groups, or any type of group!
reviews.cons: Not much very useful, rare occasion I met the rare max video call size would be the only detriment.

reviews.title: “Good alternative to Skype”
reviews.pros: This was a very easy to use program. It was extremely convenient and could be easily installed on multiple computers for straightforward communication around the office. It stores conversations so I can easily go back and look at what I had previously talked to someone about, even from a different machine.
reviews.cons: I didn't come across any faults while using this program.

reviews.title: “Mensajería muy buena. Fácil de integrar con productos google”
reviews.text: En general estoy muy conforme con la aplicación.
reviews.pros: Lo que mas me gusta es la posibilidad de trabajar con documentos almacenados en Drive
reviews.cons: Hasta el momento no he encontrado alguna desventaja. Solo le falta un uso mas masivo.

reviews.title: “Somewhat useful tool”
reviews.text: As a free add on it is great but I would not pay extra for it.
reviews.pros: We have Google for our business email so therefore we also have the google chat.  It is somewhat useful as I hate voicemails when you just need to get a quick word to someone
reviews.cons: That said as I have no volume on my computer when I am working the chat can easily be missed if not looking for it when not in your email.

reviews.title: “Great for communicating at work! ”
reviews.text: Such a great feature to use while at work!
reviews.pros: I love that I can still communicate while working without picking up a phone!
reviews.cons: I wish there was a way to email a transcript of a script!

reviews.title: “Google Chat provides an easy way to communicate with others while doing business ”
reviews.pros: Team communication is a key feature that proves to be very useful.
reviews.cons: The chat suddenly clears and messages can be confusing due to the inability to reference individual messages

reviews.title: “Great Chatting Tool”
reviews.text: it is smooth and easy to use, also it is easy to chat with multiple parties at the same time. It is easy to see the chat history if you need to.
reviews.pros: it is built-in with Google Gmail, so you don't need to download separate software. It is also synced with the mobile version.
reviews.cons: the chat history is mixed with archive emails. Some of the chat histories don't need to be saved. it takes storage space.

reviews.title: “When you are on the computer, I think it's the best way for texting”
reviews.pros: It is so convenient when you are on pc and you can use it in your formal relationship. All functions are included
reviews.cons: I have not encountered any difficulties or missings.

reviews.title: “Google Chat”
reviews.text: User friendly and makes it really easy to chat with people all over the world. I've enjoyed using the product.
reviews.pros: I like that it is easy to use and allows you to connect with anyone worldwide. It makes it fun to interact with people online.
reviews.cons: I can't think of anything that would need to be added to the product. I like it the way it currently is.

reviews.title: “A great chatting platofrom”
reviews.pros: Google Chat makes it very easy to chat in a fast and secure environment. I like how you can use this on Gmail as well.
reviews.cons: I have used Google Chat for a while now and haven't experienced any problems so far.

reviews.title: “Easy-to-access communication resource”
reviews.text: I really like the application because I can communicate through the browser's own website
reviews.pros: the application gathers all my contacts easily and quickly, it is fast
reviews.cons: the app sometimes crashes, Sometimes the status is not updated

reviews.title: “Google Chat is great for communication within our team!”
reviews.text: Overall, I love the Google Chat Feature and would highly recommend to others.
reviews.pros: What I like most about Google Chat is that I can see which of my colleagues are online and ask them a question when needed.
reviews.cons: What I like least about the software is that more people don't use it! I would love it if all of my clients had the ability to chat!

reviews.title: “Great alternative ”
reviews.text: Good! Do have to say the ping Boise is thankfully not loud and obnoxious like any other messaging / notifications
reviews.pros: Great alternative when slack is down. It’s great to have quick contact with coworkers
reviews.cons: The functions can be quite basic. Viewing images/videos is a bit outdated on web browser, but the app seems to work well. It’s be nice if the web version was a bit more updated.

reviews.title: “Google Chat Review ”
reviews.pros: I thoroughly enjoyed the way this software keeps your contacts organized.
reviews.cons: I think this software could have had more detailed instructions on how to set it up.

reviews.title: “I don't like the chat ”
reviews.text: I solve no problem with the application because it hard to understand the application
reviews.pros: The product is not easy to used, no sticker, no dark mode, my biggest problem with the application is that is not easy to used
reviews.cons: Is the most difficult app I ever used everything is boldly. Sometimes I don't even know what am doing when using the app

reviews.title: “No Go Google! ”
reviews.text: We had enough unsatisfied clients to send this away happily.
reviews.pros: Nothing.  All around a huge waste of time, money, and energy. Lots of delayed projects due to miscommunication.
reviews.cons: The quality was disappointing,  user interface was shaky at best, and, again,  complete lack of customer support.

reviews.title: “Good chat client”
reviews.pros: This is a pretty basic chat feature. Think of something comparable to MSN messenger back when that was popular. It is a nice simple chat feature for anyone who has a Google account
reviews.cons: This is just a chat client, so sending images, files, etc can be limited. It is also restricted to those who have a Google account.

reviews.title: “Great and simple tool that gets the job done”
reviews.text: Chat will always have a place in the space. It's an important tool.
reviews.pros: It just works. It's easy to find and present when needed. There are many who consider it the pioneer of mainstream chat.
reviews.cons: Google chat is pretty basic when it comes to online chat tools. It offers just enough functionality but some will wish for more and possibly more connectivity with other tools.

reviews.title: “Best way of communication”
reviews.text: Stay connected easily without running here and there. It's cool and useful.
reviews.pros: No need to run next to colleague if we need any information instead we can ask for the details sitting in one place through chat. It helped a lot by saving time and yes of course the energy too!!
reviews.cons: Nothing as of now, as I am using chat service everyday.

reviews.title: “Integrative Tool”
reviews.text: Overall work great with other products. If using other services from Google, it is very useful.
reviews.pros: It works perfectly with other Google applications, such as drive and email. This allows good communication with several people during projects.
reviews.cons: Not a lot of users know of it, making it harder to use. Many functions were moved to different applications making it less useful.

reviews.title: “Chat for my day to day”
reviews.text: I use chat in my daily life to integrate my activities with my co-workers. It is very practical and quickly easy to learn by everyone.
reviews.pros: The program is small to install and has a great performance, it is possible to send any file and create bots in the messages.
reviews.cons: There should be the possibility to send audios in the chat in addition to text.

reviews.title: “G SUITE CHAT”
reviews.text: I have had an overall pleasant experience using Chat and use it on a daily basis.
reviews.pros: I like the ease of chatting  with coworkers on Chat.  It is user friendly and I like to be able to  see when they are responding.
reviews.cons: I do not have any major issues with Chat for G-Suite. If you have used Hangout you will understand how to use this.

reviews.title: “Review for Google Chat”
reviews.text: Since the company uses G-suite for emails, everyone from the company were able to chat through Google Chat, really easy to use!
reviews.pros: It's basically classic hangout, that you can chat with anyone on your email list.
reviews.cons: Nothing really, it's like a instant sms for computer.

reviews.title: “instant communication with Google Chat.”
reviews.pros: Google Chat is easy to use and free, it really is an amazing service and I recommend it to all users.
reviews.cons: I think that improvements in its functionalities could be added to optimize its performance.

reviews.title: “helps us communicate”
reviews.pros: Instead of having to pick up the phone or send an email, we use google hat. its a lot fast and easier to use
reviews.cons: I wish they would maybe add GIF's to chat

reviews.title: “Very useful at work”
reviews.text: It's great! I can share pictures or just important messages.
reviews.pros: It has been very useful at work to share quick information with a big group of people of even just send a quick message to a colleague
reviews.cons: I have been using for a short time so nothing negative to comment about it yet. After a few months I can update my review.

reviews.title: “Nice!”
reviews.pros: Have never come across any issues while using this. So easy and nice to chat with fellow coworkers.
reviews.cons: I do not dislike anything about this software.

reviews.title: “Stay in contact all day long!”
reviews.pros: Very easy to use, stay connected with colleagues on a mutual platform.
reviews.cons: Sometimes I didn't realize I had a notification until much later in the day.

reviews.title: “Google Hangouts for internal instant communication”
reviews.text: I found the platform useful for basic internal instant communication.
reviews.pros: Google Hangouts is completely user friendly, very easy to use and it allows its user to chat with colleagues.
reviews.cons: The interface of Google Hangouts it's basic, its functions are limited and chat files sharing it's not well supported.

reviews.title: “Solid, simple to use software.”
reviews.pros: Chat has a very clean simple interface plus its convenient since its integrated into Gmail and apart of Google Suite. I like the screen sharing feature for business meetings.
reviews.cons: Almost too simple, not many features compared to other similar software. The call quality is usually great but sometimes I can hear a background "fuzz" like sound.

reviews.title: “Helps to communicate with friends who have Google accounts.”
reviews.text: Expressing thoughts to contacts instantly.
reviews.pros: The ability to communicate instantly with someone from your contact list and the availability of emojis to visualize/enhance your expressions.
reviews.cons: There is nothing least about this software that I can report on at this time.  More time is needed to comment on this area.

reviews.title: “Basic Chat Integrated to Your Gmail”
reviews.pros: Chat on Gmail is a basic feature, but what's nice is that you can search old chats if you have it set up to save them.
reviews.cons: The integration with gmail can be confusing since it's below your folders. It's not clearly called out.

reviews.title: “Easy to use”
reviews.text: Chat is easy to use and great for instructors and students to use without being disruptive.
reviews.pros: easy to use, simple to intitiate and engage in conversations, easy to chat quickly during a class and to relay information simply
reviews.cons: I wish there were more options for notifications about chats that come up. Maybe an email reminder about chats you have not responded to?

reviews.title: “Simple way to connect with those one my Google address book”
reviews.text: It's free, it works, and it doesn't get much better than that!
reviews.pros: I like that I can message those in my address book directly from my G-Mail dashboard. It allows me to continue to multitask without having to leave my desktop for say a  tablet or phone.
reviews.cons: The features are slightly limited but as a simple chat program it does exactly what it is meant to do.

reviews.title: “Does its Job”
reviews.text: We just kind of slowly stopped using it and switched to Slack.
reviews.pros: I liked that it was in the same panel as my Gmail. But it is night and day compared to Slack. Really hard to collaborate, create group chats, find chats, etc. Very limited.
reviews.cons: It just isn't that useful other than a 2010's version of AOL Instant Messenger. Not very useful for work purposes.

reviews.title: “Learning curve”
reviews.pros: Google puts out a great product suite and the price is right!  Still need to familiarize myself more with the features and functionality.
reviews.cons: I'm not as familiar with the google suite of products and I'm still getting used to the format.  I think it'll be a good communications tool for us in the end.

reviews.title: “Google Chat Review”
reviews.pros: What I like most about this software is it lets me communicate easily with others
reviews.cons: What I like least about this software is it has a LOT of bugs, sometimes notifications don't go away or appear again after I checked them.

reviews.title: “Google always hits it out of the park”
reviews.text: It's been a great overall experience. I plan to continue to use Chat into the future.
reviews.pros: I love using Google products because they easily work with each other. This is no exception, using chat straight from my email is a great option.
reviews.cons: I wish more people used it! I love using the chat and find it a convenient and easy way to send messages and stay updated.

reviews.title: “It's Google Everything for me!”
reviews.pros: If you already have a google account, then chances are this feature is also available! It is easy to use with a push of a button to get started with those who are already in your contacts! So yeah, it's kind of a big deal! And it replaced Hangouts
reviews.cons: Nothing! I love mostly everything about GOOGLE!

reviews.title: “Google Chat is a good way to communicate online”
reviews.text: Great for creating group chats with other Google users, easy to set up and link to your Gmail.
reviews.pros: Google chat is easy to use, great for communicating online, having group chats and sharing documents online.
reviews.cons: People tend to want to use more recognizable chat programs or video meeting software. Would be good if it could be integrated with other email programs.

reviews.title: “Chat is excellent with G Suite”
reviews.text: Chat allows us to informally communicate very quickly with our office mates.
reviews.pros: Since our company already uses G Suite, Chat was a no brainer for intra-office informal communication.
reviews.cons: I do not have any cons with Chat. This software is already a part of G Suite so came at no additional cost to us and is very useful.

reviews.title: “Amazing!”
reviews.pros: I love that it’s connected to email and you could join from your calendar directly.

reviews.pros: It's built right into your email page, so you don't need to run additional software to use it.
reviews.cons: Separate conversations could probably be organized better, so it's easier to keep track.

reviews.title: “Review of Google Chat”
reviews.text: We've found Google Chat to be effective for our office given that our sales managers are working remotely.
reviews.pros: The user interface is straightforward and easy, and the quality of the chats is good.  It can be used on your mobile phone.  The ability to share files is very helpful.   And it's great that it integrates with Google Calendar.  Helpful that the messages are encrypted.
reviews.cons: We had problems in the beginning with what appeared to be duplicating of our chats, but our IT area helped to resolve.   No significant problems otherwise.

reviews.title: “Chit Chat Time!”
reviews.text: Love chitting and love chatting? This is software for you. Yes, I'm a real person.
reviews.pros: Love being able to chat with my friends and colleagues using the same programs and websites that all of my data and correspondence is contained within.
reviews.cons: I wish more people knew about the software to limit the use of other message applications, but that's not a flaw in the software itself.

reviews.title: “Works Well”

reviews.cons: The video calling often had a lot of problems.

You can access all of your contacts and talk to them in real time in a number of ways.  Your meetings can be organized and view nicely in the app.  Overall, it is a nice setup that rivals Office 365.
reviews.cons: Like any software, google is evolving fast with many changes in this particular arena.  Sometimes they can cause problems.
